# dnacenter_compliance_check_run (Data Source)

It performs create operation on Compliance.

- Run compliance check for device(s).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "dnacenter_compliance_check_run" "example" {
  provider     = dnacenter
  categories   = ["string"]
  device_uuids = ["string"]
  trigger_full = "false"
}
```
